com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.query

Interface QueryPanel<T extends QueryModel>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of QueryModel backing the panel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSequenceQueryPane, ChemicalQueryPane, QueryFieldPanel, QueryGroupPanel, SequenceMotifQueryPane, SequenceQueryPane, StructureSimilarityQueryPane

    public interface QueryPanel<T extends QueryModel>
    An interface for query dialog components which will contain a CountClearButtonBox. The query is backed by a QueryModel implementation. Most methods have default implementations delegating to either the backing QueryModel or the displayed CountClearButtonBox
    Since:
    1.28.0
    Author:
    S.Roughley knime@vernalis.com

    • Method Summary
